result.name: northern-ireland-local-authority-collected-municipal-waste-management-statistics
result.notes: Information on the quantities of local authority collected municipal waste collected and managed in Northern Ireland. It includes quantities and rates of local authority collected municipal waste arising, sent for preparing for reuse, for dry recycling, composting, energy recovery and sent to landfill. Some of these measurements are key performance indicators. These are used to assess progress towards achieving waste strategy targets. Breakdowns are available by district council and waste management group. The information contains finalised data from 2006/07 to the latest available data.

organization.name: open-data-ni
organization.title: OpenDataNI
organization.description:
[OpenDataNI] (https://www.opendatani.gov.uk) is the brand name for the Open Data portal which facilitates easy access to Northern Ireland public sector data for both reuse and redistribution. 

OpenDataNI has been developed as part of the Digital NI initiative. Digital NI aims to help establish a culture within Northern Ireland that develops and enhances Digital capability not just through interactions with Government, but also with local companies and throughout communities. Within government the Digital Transformation Service is facilitating this cultural shift through a number of methods, transforming Government services, making data open and available and encouraging and coaching those who lack digital skills.

It is recognised that opening up our data is the right thing to do in terms of transparency, accountability and efficiency of the Public Sector in Northern Ireland. It has the potential to encourage new commercial opportunities and drive economic growth and innovation across public and private sectors.

result.title: Northern Ireland Local Authority Collected Municipal Waste Management Statistics

resources.description:
This dataset accompanies the Northern Ireland local authority collected municipal waste management statistics reports. It contains finalised, validated information on the quantities of local authority collected municipal waste collected and managed in Northern Ireland from 2006/07 to the latest available including provisional quarterly data. It provides information on the quantities and rates of local authority collected municipal waste arising, sent for preparing for reuse, for dry recycling, composting, energy recovery and sent to landfill. Some of these measurements are key performance indicators. These are used to assess progress towards achieving waste strategy targets. Breakdowns are available by district council and waste management group.

For printer-friendly tables, which link to the quarterly and annual reports, see the data tables appendix file. Both it and the reports are available from the DAERA website.
https://www.daera-ni.gov.uk/articles/northern-ireland-local-authority-collected-municipal-waste-management-statistics
resources.name: Northern Ireland local authority collected municipal waste management statistics time series

resources.description: This is a pdf document providing more information about the csv time series file. Specifically it contains a list of all variable names with notes where appropriate.
resources.name: Metadata for time series csv file
